title: Trump's tariff threat at Apple is 'frustrating situation for investors,' Wedbush says (AAPL:NASDAQ)
description: President Trump's threat that Apple (AAPL) will have to pay a 25% tariff on iPhones not made in the U.S. adds to a “frustrating situation for investors,” Wedbush Securities said. Read for more.

title: Trump threatens 25% tariffs on Apple if iPhones not US made
description: US President Donald Trump threatened Apple Inc. with a tariff of at least 25% if it does not manufacture its iPhones in the US, ramping up pressure on the tech giant to secure more domestic production.

title: The EURUSD moves lower after Trump imposed 50% tariff on EU goods
